duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead maintainable and efficient Python code development, coordinate code version deployments through configuration control processes, and support Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD) needs.
Lead development of Slurm scripting for job scheduling execution on high-performance computing clusters, and wrap FORTRAN codes with Python interface for scalability and data management efficiency.

Lead small projects and teams, mentor junior developers, evaluate and recommend new tools and technology stacks, develop Machine Learning (ML) techniques, and develop Artificial Intelligence (AI) systems for wargaming applications.

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree in Computer Science/Engineering or related technical field from an ABET accredited institution and 6 years of related experience; or an equivalent combination of education and experience directly related to the job duties. At this level a Ph.D. may be preferred.
